name: Sponsered Link
author: Red Symbol Technologies

sections.description:
Simple WordPress Sponser Link Plugin

Sponsered Link is the best WordPress plugin. Sponsered Link allow you to easily create and manage Sponser Link through a simple admin interface.

You can dislay random sponser link in wordPress post, page or widget.

SponserLink plugin features include

  • NEW Display SponserLink as default option is on settings page
  • pagination setting
  • display sponser link on front page
  • Choose display type grid and list
  • add images with Sponser Link
  • Images show only in grid view
  • Choose anchor target
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload sponseredLink to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Create new SponserLink in the Sponser Link Panel.
  4. Place <?php do_shortcode('[SponseredLink]'); ?> in your templates
  5. use shortcode [SponseredLink] in page,post, widget

short_description: Sponsered Link is the best WordPress plugin. Sponsered Link allow you to easily create and manage Sponser Link through a simple admin interface.
